values:
Suicide hotline, may I help you?"
"Yeah...uhh...well I'm about to fuckin' kill myself."
"Listen...you don't wanna do that, okay?  You don't wanna do that."
"I'm gonna...there's so many fuckin' reasons why I don't even need to be here anymore.  I'm gonna put a slug in my fuckin' head!"
"You don't wanna do that, you wanna be here on earth, okay?"
"Fuck that shit man, I got a gun right now and I got it right under my chin man, fuck that!  I'm gonna fuckin' blow my head all over the ceiling!  Fuck this shit man!"
"Hey...talk to me, okay?"

It ain't no point to me wakin' up
Everybody's time I'm takin' up
I got nobody, it ain't a shoulder near
I can't stay here and it's colder there
I don't wanna look back cuz it's gonna hurt
I slice my wrist and it's gonna squirt
For me, everybody holds a hate
I get backstabbed and everybody holds a stake
There's no roads to take, I'm in a circle drive
Bustin' at myself and I'm tryin' to survive
I'll disappoint you, and I will let you down
And I ain't got many homeboys coming around
You don't understand so don't say you do
I swear I'll put a motherfuckin' slug in you
I'm the only one, the lonely one
At home alone, loading a gun
Thinkin', why not?

"Why not?  What do you mean why not?  Okay, look, you  have feelings inside your head, okay?  I understand that.  Feelings lead to depression. When you have depression, you have a lonely void inside of your heart, okay?  And your heart means everything to the world.  Okay?

I got court comin' up, I stole a truck
I got a bitch pregnant and I'm broke as fuck
I wanna get high, but I got piss-test
I'm always first name on top of shit-list
Get this: the witch has made my chest
It's permanent nightly visiting nest
It ain't no clothes that I look good in
I'm the motherfuckin' big red train that couldn't
I got no family, I stole they shit
Restraining orders and I still won't quit
I hit rock bottom and then I fell in a hole
And then I fell thru the floor of that hole some more
I been missin' for a year, nobody's looking
I got beat down and my shit tooken
I look ahead and all I see is more of the same
Or this self inflicted bullet hole pourin' my brain

"Ooookay...I understand that you're in pain, okay?  I understand everything you're going thru, I've been there myself, okay?  Now...your pain is my pain, alright?  And I feel your pain, and I wanna be your friend.  Just me and you...friends."

I dream about cuttin' heads off with a shovel
The dreams are gettin' serious, think I'm in trouble
I don't hold memory for more than an hour
I'm tired as fuck and I'm drained of power
I ain't halfway there and I'm all out of time
I'm like a crushed lightbulb: all out of shine
I been around the world and no place is home
I wanna see the other side when I face this chrome
I'm butt naked, I been jackin' off, gettin' drunk
It's my last hours alive, who gives a fuck?
It don't matter, I'm doin' this shit in the garage
Tryin' to make it easier for them to clean my head splash
This bitch I loved, I hope she finds me
Still up in a chair with my thoughts behind me
I'm bout to do it! "No-"
*beep*
Can you hold for a second?
"Wait a min-"

There ain't nobody askin' me where I been
There ain't nobody that would make me as a friend
There ain't nobody that's droppin' by to say hi
There ain't nobody that's carin' whether I live or die
I have nobody to tell about my growing angers
I have nobody to tell about me following strangers
There ain't nobody makin' sure I'm taking all of my pills
There ain't nobody slowin' me down and keepin' me still

I'm truly alone
A man can only be alone for so long
Before the man's mind is gone
I'm truly alone
A man can only be alone for so long
Before the man's mind is gone
I'm so alone
A man can only be alone for so long
Before the man's mind is gone
I'm truly alone

Before the man's mind is gone

There ain't nobody tellin' me not to jump off
There ain't nobody tellin' me not to chop your block off
I get so bloody I ruin all of my clothes
I get so bloody I sit in the dark alone
I have nobody to tell about my dark fantasies
I have nobody to tell about my dark realities
There ain't nobody around me, nobody wanna be friends
I get so bloody all on me, the mess never ends

I'm truly alone
A man can only be alone for so long
Before the man's mind is gone
I'm truly alone

Before the man's mind is gone
I'm so alone

Before the man's mind is gone

Walked into a Super K and went to the back
Started asking questions, checked out the chainsaw rack
They had a test model, I pulled the cord and got it runnin'
Turned the blade on the kid workin' and blood started gunnin'
What the fuck am I doin'?, I dropped the shit and started cryin'
I made it down aisles before some hero clotheslined me
I got up, grabbed a shovel, and stabbed him in the gut
I pulled it out and hammered it across the back of his nug
I hear sirens goin' off, it's no blue light specials
I turned murderer, taking in the daily life pressures
But fuck that, now all y'all gonna know me
See me on TV bein' like, "Look, there go my homie"
I'm more than lonely and lost, lives are the cost
I just beat some bitch in the head, stabbed her twice and took off
They can't find me, I'm hidin' in a flannel coat rack
I jump out and attack and put a gash in your neck
I finally made it to the front door and to the parking lot
That's when I got shot a lot, I got got.
Police with bullets and more bullets, pluggin' me deep
I'm seein' flashes, hearing screaming, and it's all over me
See a crowd of people being held behind the police tape
All watching me die, I think I made no mistake
I finally got some recognition, dying on my knees
Ready for hell because compared to my life, it should be an ease

Nice and easy....a cake walk....I'm ready...

She says people do not like to listin to her talk about GOD or the Bible, and all i want to do is tell her cuz that all you FUCKING talk about DAMM IT. All you talk about is how good GOD is, if there was a GOD nothing bad would happen to you. She all way saying GOD dose not walk away from you, you walk  away from him. i found out of this was happyiest or not. and it is not it was just live playing a joke on me again and once again i fell for it.

it been a few week, and i till feel that same. i was thinkng is this what happiest feel like?????? My best friend is the world is back from FL so i been hagin out with him. And i mat a girl i though a friend of mine. the next i see my friend i am going to ask her what her friend story and the fenny thing is the girl name is Jenny. if you know me i do not have the best of lucky with girl name jenn, jenny, jennfer. so i think it is funny. but i do not know what she thinks of me yet. anyway that about it till next time. i'm out

i got my tattoo done today. it really did not hurt that much when i got it done but it hurt a little now. now i got three one more to go then i am done with my arms. the last three day have been fun sunday want to Bush for the day after that i want to a pool party at 11pm then we played hide and go seek till about 3:30. a buch of 19,20,21,22 year old playing hide and go seek man i got dorking friends. monday i got to witch WWE and just be a bum. today i got my tattoo done and i want to shot pool. witch i seen Matt up there with Mike i say hey to both of them and Matt did not say anything back Mike did. i tryed. tomorrow i am going to wish my car clean it out and then clean my room and go find new boots and shoes. thusday i am going to Va Beach to look at bass. my best friend Dustin is going to come back in to town frinday or satday witch is cool. i have not got to hang out with him in a long time. so right now my life dose not suck. i cant say what will happen tomorrow but right now i am a little bit happy.

i been stay up all night for the last four days. i have not gone to sleep till after my mom has left for work. she leave 9 and i been getting up at 10 feelling find. my mom said i been staying up cuz of all the DUE i drink but i think it is cuz its to fucking hot to sleep. anyways to day is my little  cuz Kai brithday and he is 3 today. Kai is one of the thing i think about ever day to help me go on. i think monday i am going to go see how much my tattoo will cushed and then go get it on tuseday and then i am going to get my car washed. $15 to get my car washed is not that bad cuz i have not washed in a year...lol... damm i" need to get some sleep. like when everyone tell me to get some sleep" i say " i sleep when i am dead" oh ya i might get fried on sunday cuz i told my boss i was not comeing in and he thinks i am but he is a ass hole anyways. so i will put up on here what happens

i talk to Jenn(Bob) to night. it been almost a year. i did miss see her and talking to her. so that was cool. i do not know what going to happen next but it was just nice to talk to her. other then that i have three big thing to think of now. one bring i like my job when i am cooking cuz i like to cook i all way have. but i am really getting sick of scott shit. my mom and dad are push to go in two the shityeard, i never want to work there ever but it pay batter and i hope i will not get bitch at so much there. the other thing is i need to get out of my house like ASAP. i mean i love my mom and dad but i am getting sick of there shit too i mean am almost 22 years old i do not need them to treat me like a baby. and the three thing is my boy Sean he is cool and all but i need to find someone that i can trust that dose not do drug. i hope befor my 22 birth day to be out of this house and in my own place.

nothing really been up with me. been working 7 days aweek at my crapping job. going to be moive out of my house at the end of this mouth or next mouth. my boy Sean who is going to be my roommat is show me how to play the bass if i get good i am going to the bass for his band. other then that just the same old shit.

I been spit on abandoned and abused  forgotten  unloved and lost, my hearts pounds with rage no way to gage my future. knowing i was made for so much more knowing i was made to soar. with my head held high and my heart held down, i keep march on day by day hiding my pain,  living with no more shame just wanting the laughin to end, then i start to grin knowing i'm  still here without fear. no one can stop me now as i rise to my feet i see you start to weep and cry for you see into my eyes and you look surprised shocked and scared cause you will never put me down again, this look on my face no longer hidden with sin scares even me, why cant people see what they done to me, that sweet little boy who used to be so care free is dead and gone and now what's left is a man standing alone unable to go down.



                                        Brian Slaydon
                                           3/16/04

you are a fucking coward,man.how dare you call me what you did?that's a fucking low insult,and i didn't believe that even you would stoop so low for me just stating my opinion.
i used to have respect because i thought that you actually weren't a coward and i took you for your words.now i realize that you're just a pathetic little wimp hiding behind big, bullshit words.you post on your live journal about "fucking us all",and then you block our ass without ever actually coming out and saying what you thought was wrong with how we were being friends with you.that's complete bullshit,so you know what?? FUCK YOU TOO.
and we were NOT purposely trying to blow you off.i'm sorry if we all have lives outside of each other and other friends as well.and again,you never told us that you thought we were blowing you off.AGAIN,your fault for not telling us what you were thinking.we're not fucking mind readers,we don't have these huge inflated egos that we think we can do all things,when we know we can't.(for the intellectually challenged,i'm saying that we don't act like you,and how you claim that you're better at alot of things than other people.)
Did you ever stop and think that maybe you might be the reason why people stop hanging out with you?i mean,i can't speak for anyone else,but i know that i would get tired of being condescended to,and belittled all the time.(i know those are probably huge words for slow,dyslexic people such as yourself,but get your little "girl" to help you out with the meanings.)
and you wanted to correct my wrong date on my live journal,so i decided to help you out and correct every little thing wrong with this journal entry.i would do it for your whole journal,but that would take WAY too long,so i'll just do it for this entry. okay,here we go...
1)"i am tired everyone shit" (needs an apostraphe "s")
2)find should be "fine"
3)lest should be "least"
4)thow should be "through"
5)"THIS IS MY ALL POSTING" doesn't even make sense.
so fuck you,go clean the nutsmell out of your car,and learn to have some respect and tact in what you say.
